alert.note: Alert for Brazos; Grimes; Houston; Madison; Montgomery; Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 11:48AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Trinity, northern Grimes, northeastern Brazos, northwestern Montgomery, northwestern San Jacinto, southern Houston, Madison and Walker Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1147 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Mart to 17 miles southwest of Centerville to 9 miles southeast of Madisonville to near Riverside. Movement was southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madisonville, Trinity, New Waverly, Riverside, Bedias, Kurten, Wixon Valley, Huntsville State Park, Iola, Crabbs Prairie, North Zulch, Roans Prairie, Richards and Carlos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Brazos; Grimes; Houston; Madison; Montgomery; Trinity; Walker
